title: Cold weather and data centres drive up US greenhouse gas emissions
full_text: Cold weather and data centres drive up US greenhouse gas emissions. US emissions of planet-warming gases rise for the first time in three years.. Matt McGrathEnvironment correspondent A very cold start to 2025 and the growing power demands of data centres and cryptocurrencies saw US emissions of planet-warming gases rise for the first time in… [+3470 chars]
